musicalLanguage.description: An ethereal, Enya-inspired piece built on shimmering open fifths and gentle arpeggiated patterns. The melody floats above a bed of sustained harmonies, evoking the image of light refracting through water.
teachingGoals: Learn to sustain open voicings with pedal
